message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - plugily.projects.thebridge.kits.level.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - plugily.projects.thebridge.kits.premium.*.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Arrays' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.kits.premium.*'.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.kits.premium.*'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.logging.Level' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.kits.premium.*'.
